title: Acoustic Afternoons
description: Warm acoustic guitars and unplugged melodies. Perfect for a laid-back afternoon.

title: EDM Essentials
description: High-energy electronic dance music to get you moving. Turn up the BPM and feel the drop!

title: Feel Good Mix
description: Bright, uplifting songs to spark your day. Let the positive vibes take over!

title: Indie Picks
description: Discover hidden gems from talented indie artists. Fresh sounds beyond the mainstream.

title: Jazz Junction
description: Smooth saxophones, groovy bass lines, and timeless swing. Perfect for unwinding or classy evenings.

title: Late Night Drive
description: Dreamy, atmospheric sounds for night cruising. Your soundtrack for endless roads and deep thoughts.

title: Pop Parade
description: A parade of the catchiest pop hits from today’s charts. Stay in tune with what everyone’s humming.

title: Rainy Day Vibes
description: Gentle, mellow tunes for cozy days. Set the mood when the world slows down.

title: Rock Revival
description: Revisit the anthems of classic and modern rock. From power chords to power ballads, crank it up!

title: Sad Songs Club
description: Soulful melodies for heart-touching moments. Sometimes you just need a good cry.

title: Sunset Beats
description: Chill grooves for golden hour. Watch the sun go down with relaxing melodies.

title: Throwback Gold
description: Nostalgic tracks from the 90s and 2000s. Relive the golden hits of your childhood.

title: Workout Pulse
description: High-energy tracks to fuel your workout sessions. Push your limits with motivational beats.
